name: Duster
description:
Duster is a retro Western where you roll a unique character and follow a bird spirit to gold, adventure, and likely hilarious death. Every character you create starts with different bonuses that helps you to and hunt down the corrupt officials, crooked lawmen, and violent outlaws guarding a lost treasure. Be warned, once your dead you’re down for good.

 DUSTER EARLY ACCESS

  • Automatic updates on itch.io
  • Get major announcements first
  • Includes future support for Steam
  • New content and gameplay with each update
  • Play and stream Duster before anyone else

GAMEPLAY

Every game is generated uniquely. You’ll find an amazing world filled with poisonous snakes, roaming bandit gangs, giant steam robots, and other drifters out to find the gold first.

  • Seek out and Assassinate ruthless criminals
  • Explore an immense desert that’s unique every time
  • Fight bandits, escape cultists, dodge robots, search caves, pan gold, and survive in the search of cold hard cash
  • Dynamic combat system of stealth, parries, guns, duels, and exciting attacks
  • A perilous desert that kills for good, no saving!
